IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: INDEPENDENT, COEDUCATIONAL, COLLEGE PREPARATORY SCHOOL FOR GRADES 7-12.
IRS990.MissionDesc: JOHN BURROUGHS SCHOOL SEEKS TO INSTILL THE JOY OF LIVING THROUGH ACTIVE LEARNING, INTEGRITY AND SERVICE TO OTHERS. OUR MISSION IS TO FOSTER IN OUR STUDENTS ACADEMIC, PHYSICAL AND CREATIVE FULFILLMENT, TOGETHER WITH STRENGTH OF CHARACTER.
IRS990.Desc: JOHN BURROUGHS, FOUNDED IN 1923, IS A NOT-FOR-PROFIT EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTE COMMITTED TO A LIBERAL ARTS EDUCATION WITH A BALANCE OF EMPHASIS AMONG ACADEMICS, ARTS, ATHLETICS AND ACTIVITIES. JOHN BURROUGHS SCHOOL ENROLLS 660 STUDENTS FROM THROUGHOUTTHE METROPOLITAN ST. LOUIS AREA IN GRADES 7 THROUGH 12.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: BURR OAK & BOMBER SPORTS SUMMER DAY CAMP FOR GRADE-SCHOOL AGED CHILDREN.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: AUXILIARY SERVICES INCLUDING: 1) OPERATIONS OF ON-CAMPUS BOOKSTORE INCLUDING GENERAL STUDENT SUPPLIES, JOHN BURROUGHS SCHOOL MERCHANDISE, AND OTHER ITEMS FOR THE CONVENIENCE OF THE STUDENTS. 2) RECREATION CENTER MANAGEMENT AND HEALTH AND FITNESS CLUB FOR MEMBERS. 3) ENTRANCE EXAM REVENUE FOR 88 STUDENTS WHO TOOK THE FIFTH GRADE EXPLORATORY EXAM.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: JOHN BURROUGHS SCHOOL MANAGES FUNDS FOR VARIOUS STUDENT ORGANIZATIONS.
THE SCHOOL'S ENDOWMENT SUPPORTS TUITION AID, FACULTY SALARIES, FACULTY PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT AND GENERAL OPERATIONS.

THIS STATEMENT, AS REQUIRED BY IRS INSTRUCTION, APPLIES TO ORGANIZATIONS WITH AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS WHEN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS INCLUDE A FOOTNOTE ADDRESSING FIN 48 (ASC 740). IRS REQUIRES THE FULL TEXT OF THE FOOTNOTE BE PROVIDED HERE IN SCHEDULE D, PART XIII, EVEN IF THE ORGANIZATION DID NOT REPORT ANY LIABILITY FOR UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS IN THE FOOTNOTE. JOHN BURROUGHS AND THE FIFTIETH ANNIVERSARY SCHOLARSHIP FUND DID NOT REPORT ANY LIABILITY FOR UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS. ACCORDINGLY, THE BELOW LANGUAGE IS PROVIDED VERBATIM TO COMPLY WITH THE IRS REQUIREMENT. "JOHN BURROUGHS SCHOOL AND THE FIFTIETH ANNIVERSARY SCHOLARSHIP FUND ARE QUALIFIED NOT-FOR-PROFIT ORGANIZATIONS UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND ARE, THEREFORE, EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES ON RELATED, EXEMPT INCOME. JOHN BURROUGHS SCHOOL'S AND THE FIFTIETH ANNIVERSARY SCHOLARSHIP FUND'S TAX RETURNS FOR TAX YEARS 2022 AND LATER REMAIN SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY TAXING AUTHORITIES. THE SCHOOL HAS EVALUATED ITS CURRENT TAX POSITIONS AND HAS CONCLUDED THAT AS OF JUNE 30, 2023, THE SCHOOL DOES NOT HAVE ANY SIGNIFICANT UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS FOR WHICH A RESERVE WOULD BE NECESSARY."
THE SCHOOL DISCLOSES IT'S NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY ON ITS WEBSITE.

JOHN BURROUGHS SCHOOL GRANTS TUITION AID TO QUALIFIED APPLICANTS IN THE FORM OF GRANTS, LOANS, OR A COMBINATION OF THE TWO. THIS AID IS BASED SOLELY ON FINANCIAL NEED OF THE FAMILY. THE AMOUNT OF AID GRANTED IS BASED ON THE EVALUATION OF THE PARENTS' FINANCIAL STATEMENT AS IT IS SUBMITTED TO SCHOOL SCHOLARSHIP SERVICE. AWARDS ARE FOR ONE ACADEMIC YEAR ONLY AND PARENTS MUST SUBMIT A NEW PARENTS' FINANCIAL STATEMENT EACH YEAR.
LIVING IN ON-CAMPUS HOUSING IS A CONDITION OF ANDREW ABBOTT'S EMPLOYMENT AS HEAD OF SCHOOL WITH JOHN BURROUGHS SCHOOL.

IssuerName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: HEALTH AND EDUCATIONAL FACILITIES AUTHORITY OF THE STATE OF MISSOURI

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ARBITRAGE EXPLANATION: THE 2022 BOND REFINANCED PRIOR FUNDING OF WHICH THE PROCEEDS WERE DRAWN DOWN AS CASH EXPENDITURES WERE MADE, THUS THERE ARE NO BOND PROCEEDS INVESTED FOR WHICH ARBITRAGE CALCULATIONS NEED TO BE MADE.
THE ORGANIZATION IS REPORTING THE NUMBER OF CONTRIBUTIONS OF ART, SECURITIES, AND REAL ESTATE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY OF THE FORM 990 WAS REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE HEAD OF SCHOOL, CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER, AND THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS REVIEWED ANNUALLY AND SIGNED BY ALL BOARD MEMBERS AND SENIOR ADMINISTRATORS. ALL OF THE SIGNED STATEMENTS ARE REVIEWED BY THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER FOR ANY CONFLICTS. THOSE STATEMENTS THAT DISCLOSE CONFLICTS ARE REVIEWED AND DOCUMENTED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE HEAD OF SCHOOL'S COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE AND SUBJECT TO A 5-YEAR CONTRACT. THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE UTILIZES COMPARISON DATA WITH SIMILAR INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS TO ENSURE THE COMPENSATION PACKAGE IS REASONABLE. THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER'S COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED ANNUALLY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: JOHN BURROUGHS SCHOOL WILL COMPLY WITH ANY WRITTEN REQUEST TO FURNISH ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.
CHANGE IN VALUE OF SPLIT INTEREST GIFT -2,663. CHANGE IN VALUE OF INTEREST RATE SWAP LIABILITY 682,153.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: SUPPORT VEHICLE AWARDING SCHOLARSHIPS TO QUALIFIED JOHN BURROUGHS STUDENTS
